item.title: Sean Paul - We Be Burnin'
item.description:
KY: 60874

Just gimme the gees
an we be clubbin yow
Gal a make
wi please
And we be
thuggin’ now
Little hennesy an
we’ll be bubblin yow
Set we mind
at ease
We got to
take it slow
So when you
see the
S p floatin don’t
provoke him
Cause the girls we be
poking got to smoking
Best thing fi
the recreation
A fi get
the best
Girls inna
every nation
All topper girls we
promotin and suportin
And dem love
how we
Flow king here
them shouting
First class
ticket invitation

England and Jamaican

burnin not concernin

wanna say

dollars turning
Cause we mind
de pon we pay
More than
gold and oil
And diamonds girls
we need dem everyday

waan fi raise me

write nuff

born Jamaican

dress type

di light

turning cause
